title: 1968: THE AMERICAN AND SCANDINAVIAN EXPERIENCES
abstract: Abstract This article compares and contrasts 1968 and many of the themes and events the late 1960s in the United States with those in Scandinavia. Along the way it examines similarities and differences in motivations, culture, ideology and politics that resulted in some similar and many different forms of social activism.
